outputs.output_descr: The Annual Work Plan aims to bulid national capacity at central and local levels for MDGs and result based planning including developing an integrated monitoring & evaluation system through operationalization of management information system.

project_descr: UN Support to Results Based Planning Monitoring and Evaluation for Millenium Development Goals and Gross National Happiness - UNDAF Outcome: 1. By 2012, opportunities for generation of income and employment increased in targeted poor areas (MDG1,8);
